Package it.polimi.ingsw.Observer.Subjects

Class ViewSubject

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Observer.Subjects.ViewSubject
Direct Known Subclasses:
CharacterCardListener, CharacterStudentListener, CLI, CloudListener, DiningListener, DiningStudentListener, EffectListener, EntranceStudentListener, GUI, GUIDrawer, IsleListener, MNListener
public abstract class ViewSubject extends Object
Subject of the View (CLI or GUI) observed by the View Observer (ClientController).
